/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and shrubs, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, punctuated by fluffy white clouds. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
